title: Target in Sight!
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>We made it in Fukuoka! Look, everyone, make sure you don’t stray too far from Kasumin, okay~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Kasumi-chan, the express bus stop is over here.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Aha! She’s so confident, and yet she’s got it all wrong.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>N-no, I don’t! Um... you know, like... We can buy juice and snacks over here... right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Oh, in that case, shall we buy some bento lunches?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I’d like a bento.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Me too! I want to try a local Fukuoka bento!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Look, look, there’s a shop where Kasumin was heading! See, I told you so, didn’t I?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Sure...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Have some more faith in Kasumin! Now, let’s go~~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I have my sights set on a mentaiko bento!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
